SEARCH
Package source.Database.Dao

Interface StaffDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
StaffDaoImpl
public interface StaffDao
The StaffDAO interface provides operations that follow the CRUD operations for persistent data storage. Also provides a method to get an entire list of staff and delete them.
Since:
11/19/2023
Author:
Isaac Chun

  • Method Details

    • createStaff

      boolean createStaff(Staff staff)
      Creates a staff in the subsequent database (perhaps for sign up feature~)
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff to add
      Returns:
      true if managed to create, false if not

    • readStaff

      Staff readStaff(DatabaseQuery query)
      Reads a staff from the subsequent database using a given query and from which table Should be mainly used for name queries.
      Parameters:
      query - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      staff object if managed to find in our database

    • readStaff

      Staff readStaff(DatabaseQuery[] queries)
      Reads a staff from the subsequent database using a given query and from which table Should be mainly used for name queries.
      Parameters:
      queries - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      staff object if managed to find in our database

    • readStaffs

      ArrayList<Staff> readStaffs(DatabaseQuery query)
      Reads all staffs that satisfies a particular property. NOTE: List can be empty if no results are found
      Parameters:
      query - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      an arraylist of staff if found, an empty list if not.

    • readStaffs

      ArrayList<Staff> readStaffs(DatabaseQuery[] queries)
      Reads all staffs that satisfies a particular property. NOTE: List can be empty if no results are found
      Parameters:
      queries - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      an arraylist of staff if found, an empty list if not.

    • updateStaff

      boolean updateStaff(Staff staff)
      Updates a staff in the subsequent database. Directly updates the file straight away.
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff to update
      Returns:
      true if managed to update, false if not

    • deleteStaff

      boolean deleteStaff(DatabaseQuery query)
      Deletes a staff in the subsequent database
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if managed to delete, false if not

      void refresh()
